    • Method Detail

      • hostsAndPortsToString

        public static String hostsAndPortsToString(List<com.google.common.net.HostAndPort> hostsAndPorts)
        Convert a list of HostAndPort objects to a comma separate string. The inverse of parseStrings(String, int).
        Parameters:
        hostsAndPorts - A list of HostAndPort objects.
        Returns:
        Comma separate list of "host:port" pairs.

      • parseString

        public static com.google.common.net.HostAndPort parseString(String addrString,
                                                            int defaultPort)
        Parse a "host:port" pair into a HostAndPort object. If there is no port specified in the string, then 'defaultPort' is used.
        Parameters:
        addrString - A host or a "host:port" pair.
        defaultPort - Default port to use if no port is specified in addrString.
        Returns:
        The HostAndPort object constructed from addrString.

      • parseStrings

        public static List<com.google.common.net.HostAndPort> parseStrings(String commaSepAddrs,
                                                                   int defaultPort)
        Parse a comma separated list of "host:port" pairs into a list of HostAndPort objects. If no port is specified for an entry in the comma separated list, then a default port is used. The inverse of hostsAndPortsToString(List).
        Parameters:
        commaSepAddrs - The comma separated list of "host:port" pairs.
        defaultPort - The default port to use if no port is specified.
        Returns:
        A list of HostAndPort objects constructed from commaSepAddrs.
